articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Sweltering streets: Hundreds of homeless die in extreme heat - CNBC
articles.description: In Phoenix, the hottest big city in America, thousands of homeless people swelter as the summer’s triple digit temperatures arrive.
articles.content: Hundreds of blue, green and grey tents are pitched under the suns searing rays in downtown Phoenix, a jumble of flimsy canvas and plastic along dusty sidewalks. Here, in the hottest big city in Ameri… [+7301 chars]
